attributes.action: Replace the National Anthem with Kill The Poor by the Dead Kennedeys
attributes.additional_details:
Replace the National Anthem with Kill The Poor, a Dead Kennedeys song.

It's not a great song by any means but right now, with the looming sale of the NHS, the implementation of the bedroom tax and a tax cut for the richest, it would at least be an honest statement of intent from our government.

Just think of the savings.
